name: Corn Casserole I
author: Polly Woodard
summary: This is the best corn casserole I've ever made. I know you will love it too! It tastes more like a souffle than anything else!
ingredients: 1 (15.25 ounce) can whole kernel corn, drained
1 (4 ounce) can diced green chilies, drained
1 (8.5 ounce) package dry corn muffin mix
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large mixing bowl, combine eggs, cream style corn, sour cream and melted butter
Stir in whole kernel corn, cheese, onion and chilies
Stir in the corn muffin mix until just moistened
Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for  75 minutes; or until an inserted knife comes out clean and the top is golden
